headline: Fidelity Select Utilities Portfolio Q4 2024 Review
summary: For the quarter, fund's Retail Class shares returned -2.77%, outperforming the -5.29% result of the MSCI U.S. IMI Utilities 25/50 Index. Read more here.

headline: Energy Transition Today - Advancing Offshore Wind Efficiency Through Atmospheric Turbulence Insights
summary: A recent joint research initiative among global wind energy stakeholders has led to significant advancements in the measurement of atmospheric turbulence for offshore wind farms. The project, POWSEIDOM JIP, spearheaded by France Energies Marines and partnered by several industry leaders, aims to enhance the efficiency and safety of offshore wind turbine operations through improved measurement and modeling tools. By utilizing advanced lidar technology, the consortium has developed algorithms...
